    • Method Detail

      • showMenu

        public void showMenu()
        Method name: showMenu. Pos: the desired option by the user is successfully chosen.

      • createGame

        public void createGame()
        Method name: createGame. Pre: The option variable must be successfully assigned to operate with the switch sequence of the selection of players. Pos: The desired option by the user is successfully chosen.

      • doOperation

        public void doOperation(int option)
        Method name: doOperation. Pre: option must be different from null or empty Pos: The method corresponding to the number sent by parameter is executed correctly
        Parameters:
        option - The operation variable must have the value entered by the user correctly assigned

      • readOption

        public int readOption()
        Method name: readOption. Pre: Read the requested number in the game options menu Pos: Stores the read value in an int variable and returns it
        Returns:
        option

      • startProgram

        public void startProgram()
        Method name: startProgram. Pre: Calls the showMenu method and reads the option that the user entered by calling the readOption method and successfully stores it in an int variable Pos: Depending on the option that the user entered, the method corresponding to the number is called or an error message is thrown if the option is not in the menu

      • chooseManually

        public void chooseManually()
        Method name: chooseManually. Pre: If the user decides to choose the option of choosing the participants manually, it is asked for the corresponding parameters in a messageCalls the showMenu method and reads the option that the user entered by calling the readOption method and successfully stores it in an int variable Pos: The game board is immediately generated with the parameters that the user previously entered if not, a message is sent as to why the board was not generated

      • assignManually

        public void assignManually(java.lang.String parameters,
                           int counter)
        Method name: assignManually. Pre: The participants must be added in an array of Strings and the counter must be started at 0 before passing to the assignManually method as a parameters; parameters and count must be different from null or empty Pos: Symbols are successfully assigned to players
        Parameters:
        parameters - array where the players are
        counter - counter that manages the number of players that the game will have

      • createWorldManually

        public void createWorldManually(java.lang.String[] parameters)
        Method name: createWorldManually. Pre: Each parameter requested at the beginning of the chooseManually method is stored in a Strings position of the parameters array except the participants; parameters must be different from null or empty Pos: The current game match is successfully created
        Parameters:
        parameters - is located the parameters that were requested to the user at startup

      • generateAutomatic

        public void generateAutomatic()
        Method name: generateAutomatic. Pre: If the user decides to choose the option of choosing the participants automatic, it is asked for the corresponding parameters in a messageCalls the showMenu method and reads the option that the user entered by calling the readOption method and successfully stores it in an int variable Pos: The game board is immediately generated with the parameters that the user previously entered if not, a message is sent as to why the board was not generated

      • assignAutomatic

        public void assignAutomatic(int amount,
                            int counter)
        Method name: assignAutomatic. Pre: The amount participants must be added in an int variable and the counter must be started at 0 before passing to the assignAutomatic method as a parameters; amount and count must be different from null or empty Pos: Symbols are successfully assigned to players
        Parameters:
        amount - maximum number of participants that the game will have
        counter - counter that manages the number of players that the game will have

      • generateRandom

        public char generateRandom(int option)
        Method name: generateRandom. Pre: The option variable is assigned the value to choose the symbol; option must be different from null or empty Pos: The symbol is chosen successfully according to the value sent by parameter, the value is returned
        Parameters:
        option - The option is the number of the symbol that the player will play when choosing the option to randomly generate participants at the start of the program
        Returns:
        option

      • createWorldAutomatic

        public void createWorldAutomatic(java.lang.String[] parameters)
        Method name: createWorldAutomatic. Pre: Each parameter requested at the beginning of the chooseManually method is stored in a Strings position of the parameters array except the participants; parameters must be different from null or empty Pos: The current game match is successfully created
        Parameters:
        parameters - is located the parameters that were requested to the user at startup

      • gameSimulation

        public void gameSimulation()
        Method name: gameSimulation. Pos: The simulation of the current game board is generated step by step until reaching the end and showing the winner

      • initializeGame

        public void initializeGame(boolean render)
        Method name: initializeGame. Pre: The render boolean variable must be false to start the board game Pos: 4 results can be displayed depending on the type of user (simul, menu, enum or another different writing): simulation of the game, return to the start menu, see the numbered board or an error message because it does not correspond to any of the above . When the render variable becomes true it means that there is a winner and it is shown
        Parameters:
        render - It is the option that shows or not the listed board

      • showWinner

        public void showWinner()
        Method name: showWinner. Pos: A message is displayed with the winner of the current game

      • calculateWinner

        public void calculateWinner()
        Method name: calculateWinner. Pre: It asked to the user in the calculateWinner method to enter the winner's nickname and this is assigned to the nickname String variable. nickname must be different from null or empty Pos: The winner is successfully saved in the database if not, a message is displayed that it could have happened.

      • showLeaderBoard

        public void showLeaderBoard()
        Method name: showLeaderBoard. Pos: The ranking of the winners of different games is shown
